dodo.title: Eggs are eaten by lizard
dodo.text: None of your mating pairs may produce offspring this turn.

dodo.title: Food source is reduced
dodo.text: Choose one of your tokens and remove it from the board.

dodo.title: Heavy rains flood rivers blocking your way
Your luck improves...
dodo.text: Don't give bad Kharma for 2 turns.

dodo.title: Find a new friend?
dodo.text: Move your predator token onto one of your tokens.

dodo.title: Caught in quicksand
dodo.text: Your movement this turn is reduced by 2.
